name: Jamie Oliver
chef_bio: Jamie Oliver is a British chef and restaurateur known for his simple, healthy, and delicious recipes.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.cooking_method: Boil pasta, mix pesto sauce, and serve hot

recipes.name: Roasted Chicken
recipes.cooking_method: Season chicken with salt and pepper, roast in the oven until cooked, and serve with roasted vegetables

recipes.name: Fish and Chips
recipes.cooking_method: Coat fish in batter, deep-fry until crispy, and serve with fries and tartar sauce

name: Chen Xiaoping
chef_bio: Chen Xiaoping is a renowned chef who specializes in Sichuan cuisine. He has won multiple awards for his culinary skills and has been featured in several food magazines and TV shows.

name: Li Hong
chef_bio: Li Hong is a master of Cantonese cuisine, known for his delicate and sophisticated dishes. He has worked in several Michelin-starred restaurants and has trained many aspiring chefs.

recipes.name: Steamed Sea Bass with Ginger and Scallions

name: Wang Ming
chef_bio: Wang Ming is a rising star in the world of Chinese cuisine, with a unique style that combines traditional flavors with modern techniques. He has worked in some of the best restaurants in Beijing and Shanghai.

recipes.name: Stir-fried Beef with Black Pepper Sauce
Braised Pork Belly with Preserved Vegetables
